login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Welcome back! Please sign in to your account.

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Join mYOUsician and connect with musicians worldwide.
register.mustAcceptTerms: You must accept the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
register.registrationAttemptError: A registration attempt for this email was already made recently. Please check your email for a verification link or wait before trying again.

errors.emailRateLimit: Too many email attempts. Please wait a few minutes before trying again.
errors.signupDisabled: Account registration is currently disabled. Please contact support.
errors.weakPassword: Password does not meet security requirements. Please use a stronger password.
errors.unknownError: An unknown error occurred during registration

forgotPassword.title: Reset Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.checkEmailMessage: We've sent a password reset link to your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password.
resetPassword.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long
resetPassword.invalidSession: Invalid or expired reset link. Please request a new password reset.
resetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now sign in with your new password.
resetPassword.unknownError: Failed to reset password. Please try again.

verifyEmail.title: Verify Email
verifyEmail.subtitle: Please check your email and click the verification link.
verifyEmail.checkEmailMessage: We've sent a verification link to your email address. Please check your inbox and click the link to verify your account.
verifyEmail.resendSubtitle: Enter your email address to receive a new verification link.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.subtitle: Enter the code from your authenticator app.

database.title: Musician Database
database.subtitle: Search and discover musicians by genre and instrument.
database.filtersDescription: Find musicians by their skills and background
database.noResults: No musicians found matching your criteria.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your musician profile and showcase your talents.
profile.dangerZoneDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
profile.deleteAccountDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers.
profile.confirmEmailPrompt: Please type your email address {email} to confirm:
profile.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete your profile? This action cannot be undone.

storage.title: File Management
storage.subtitle: Upload, download, and share your files
storage.uploadFiles: Upload your first files to get started.
storage.uploadInstruction: Drag and drop or click to select a file (max 50mb)
storage.shareDescription: Copy the link below to share your file. This link will expire in 24 hours.
storage.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this file? This action cannot be undone.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we handle and protect your data

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Rules and guidelines for using our service

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: How we store and secure your information

errors.general: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.validation: Please check your input and try again.
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

home.subtitle: A database of musicians, for musicians!
home.readyToJoin: Ready to put yourself out to the market?
home.featuresSubtitle: Built with musicians in mind, for reliability and speed

advancedSearch.title: Advanced Musician Search
advancedSearch.description: Find musicians by genre, instrument, experience level, location, and more with powerful filtering options

richProfile.title: Rich Profile Creation
richProfile.description: Create comprehensive musician profiles with education, certificates, social links, and video portfolios

locationBased.title: Location-Based Discovery
locationBased.description: Connect with musicians in your area or worldwide with country and city-specific search capabilities (Coming Soon)

videoPortfolio.title: Video Portfolio Showcase
videoPortfolio.description: Share your musical talents through video links and build a compelling online presence

directNetworking.title: Direct Networking
directNetworking.description: Connect with fellow musicians through secure contact options including email and phone

securePrivate.title: Secure
securePrivate.description: Professional-grade security with multi-factor authentication and privacy controls

footer.description: The premier platform for musicians to connect, collaborate, and grow their network. Discover talented artists and build meaningful musical relationships worldwide.
